import React from 'react' import 'react-slideshow-image/dist/styles.css' import { Fade, Zoom, Slide, } from 'react-slideshow-image' import { ArrowRightSquareFill, ArrowLeftSquareFill, List } from 'react-bootstrap-icons' import './Slider.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Image1 = 'images/PXP-1291.jpg' const Image2 = 'images/PXP-0950.jpg' function Slider() { const Images = [ { url: Image1, header: "GOD'S VINEYARD GOSPEL TOURNAMENT 2024", buttonName: "Visit the tournament", }, { url: Image2, } ] const divStyle = { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', flexDirection: 'column', width: '100%', height: '100vh', backgroundSize: 'cover' } const header = { paddingLeft: '10px', fontSize: '40px', color: 'white', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between' } const Navigators = { backgroundColor: 'transparent', color: 'transparent' } const eventbutton = { position: 'absolute', top: '350px', width: '300px', backgroundColor: 'red', opacity: '0.7', textAlign: 'center', padding: '15px', borderRadius: '5px' } return (
hello
